As RTKs initiates signaling to recruiting downstream components of the activated receiver, proteins that are immediately downstream of an activated RTK can be identified for the first time by identifying sequences in the RTK needed to activate the source of sinalage (Schlessinger and Ullrich, 1992; Pawson, 1995).
example.arg: recruiting downstream components of the activated receiver

example.text: As RTKs may have initiated signaling to rescripting downstream components of the activated receiver, proteins that are immediately downstream of an activated RTK can be identified for the first time by identifying sequences in the RTK needed to activate the source of sinalage (Schlessinger and Ullrich, 1992; Pawson, 1995).

example.text: As SCF initiated transduction of the signal to by direct dimerization of its receptor, proteins that are immediately downstream of an activated RTK can be identified for the first time by identifying sequences in RTK that are needed to activate the source of sinalage (Schlessinger and Ullrich, 1992; Pawson, 1995).

example.text: Our data present a new apical sorting pathway whereby the A0 glycoproteins (VM envelopes) that initiating the transcription into multiple site within exon 1 RPS14 are replaced by the M protein.
